channel.title: Error with Pi compiler
channel.description:
Hey guys, whenever I try to run this compiler, I get this error,
[code]'javac' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
Does anybody know how to fix it? This is my compiler.bat
[code]@echo off javac -classpath deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/jython.jar;deps/xstream.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/poi.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar -d bin src\server\event\*.java src\server\model\items\*.java src\server\model\minigames\*.java src\server\model\npcs\*.java src\server\model\objects\*.java src\server\model\players\*.java src\server\model\players\skills\*.java src\server\model\players\quests\*.java src\server\model\players\packets\*.java src\server\model\shops\*.java src\server\net\*.java src\server\task\*.java src\server\util\*.java src\server\world\*.java src\server\util\log\*.java src\server\*.java src\server\world\map\*.java src\server\model\content\*.java src\server\clip\*.java src\server\clip\region\*.java pause[/code]

item.title: Error with Pi compiler
item.dc:creator: @mitch639 mitch639
item.description:
@mitch639 wrote:

RiiPiiNFtW:

or do “C:/Program Files/Java/YOUR JDK HERE/bin/javac.exe” -cp

Read full topic

item.title: Error with Pi compiler
item.dc:creator: @b00mz1029 b00mz1029
item.description:
@b00mz1029 wrote:

How do I do that, I tried changing the -classpath dep/log4j-1.2.15.jar to -classpath lib/log4j-1.2.15.jar but it still didn’t work.

Read full topic

@b00mz1029 wrote:

Hey guys, whenever I try to run this compiler, I get this error,

'javac' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Press any key to continue . . .
